content: blending cozy fall vibes with a modern edge this crochet pumpkin topiary is perfect for adding fall magic to a space with a playful stack of three pumpkins stitched in red heart super saver the soft gold serene mint and delicate light pink blend autumn warmth with a refreshing pop of color practice single_crochet single_crochet 2 together double_crochet double_crochet 2 together working in rounds and more whether a table centerpiece or perched on a mantle this topiary creates a delightful focal point for the season materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a petal pink 0373 1 ball or 77 yds/70 m contrast b aruba sea 0505 1 ball or 116 yds/106 m contrast c saffron 0234 1 ball or 130 yds/118 m contrast d soft white 0316 1 ball or 10 yds/9 m measurement approx 15¾ 40 cm tall excluding stem 9 23 cm in wide base of large pumpkin
